generated.css: html{box-sizing:border-box}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:inherit}body{margin:0;background:linear-gradient(358deg,#000,#1c4646);background-size:600% 600%;-webkit-animation:teal-background 200s ease infinite;-moz-animation:teal-background 200s ease infinite;animation:teal-background 200s ease infinite}@keyframes teal-background{0%{background-position:53% 0}50%{background-position:48% 100%}to{background-position:53% 0}}body button{padding:1rem;border:none;background:#000;font-family:Open Sans Condensed,Bebas Neue,Franklin Gothic Condensed,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:20px;font-weight:700;text-align:right;letter-spacing:2px;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:left}ul{padding:0}a{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}h1,h2,h3,h4{margin:0}p{width:fit-content}.full-height{height:100vh}.container{padding:0 50px;max-width:1400px;margin:0 auto}nav{position:fixed;top:10vh;right:0}nav button{padding:3rem;border:none;background:#ff0;color:#000}#hero{padding:15vh 0}#hero .container{grid-gap:50px;display:block}#hero .hero-content h1{font-size:12.5vw;margin-bottom:0;text-align:center;margin-top:0}#hero .hero-content h2{margin-top:0;font-size:3.2vw;font-family:Cormorant Garamond,Lora,serif;color:#fff;text-transform:none;font-weight:500;font-style:italic;margin-bottom:4rem;text-align:center}#hero .hero-content p{margin-bottom:2rem}#hero .container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);grid-template-areas:". hero-content hero-content hero-content hero-content ."}#hero .container .hero-content{grid-area:hero-content}@media (min-width:1200px){#hero .hero-content h1{font-size:12.5rem}#hero .hero-content h2{font-size:3.4rem}#hero .hero-content p{margin-bottom:2rem}}@media (max-width:767px){#hero h2{margin-top:0;font-size:8vw;margin-bottom:3rem}#hero .hero-content p{margin-bottom:2rem}}#about{padding:15vh 0}#about .container{grid-gap:50px}#about .anim_event h2,#about .id_event h2{margin-top:0;line-height:1.1}#about .tickets{width:13.6rem}#about .rsvp{width:9.4rem}#about .container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);grid-template-areas:". event_about ". tickets . rsvp . ."}#about .container .event_about{grid-area:event_about}#about .container .details{grid-area:details;margin-top:1rem;margin-bottom:-2em}#about .container .id_event{grid-area:id_event}#about .container .anim_event{grid-area:anim_event}#about .container .tickets{grid-area:tickets}#about .container .rsvp{grid-area:rsvp}@media (max-width:768px){#about .id_event{margin-bottom:1rem}#about .container .anim_event h2,#about .container .id_event h2{font-size:3rem;margin-bottom:0}#about .container .anim_event{margin-top:3rem}#about .container .rsvp,#about
